description: This file initializes a vector database using ChromaDB, creates a knowledge base from a PDF URL, and sets up an agent to interact with the knowledge base, including running asynchronous methods to load data and generate responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with a knowledge base and can generate responses.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads content from specified PDF URLs.

classes.name: ChromaDb
classes.description: A class representing a connection to a Chroma vector database.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads data into the knowledge base, with an option to recreate the database.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response from the agent based on a query.
